MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Ruttan Project in North America dated August 2011

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Ruttan Project in North America dated August 2011
document.description: This is a comprehensive technical report detailing the former Ruttan Mine in northern Manitoba, Canada, with an effective date of February 18, 2009, and a filing date of August 19, 2011.

deposit_type_candidate.observed_name: bimodal-siliciclastic type of volcanogenic massive sulphide deposit (VMS)
